body:
Make sense. :+1:
On Apr 19, 2013 10:17 AM, "Jon Leighton" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @rafaelfranca <https://github.com/rafaelfranca>
>
> I don't think this is a rare case. Every project that I work override the
> accessor.
>
> I agree that overriding the accessor is not rare, but it is probably
> significantly more rare to override the accessor *and* use select to
> restrict the columns *and* use respond_to?. So I think we should probably
> merge this, as I think it's a net positive despite not being perfect.
>
> WDYT?
